game.name: SEBI 16
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 카메라 움직임 조정, 키보드 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: SEBI 16 packs sixteen curated singleplayer games into one charming collection: metroidvanias, puzzle games, platformers, a roguelite, and even a deck builder. Built with love in PICO-8!
game.shortDescriptionEn: SEBI 16 packs sixteen curated singleplayer games into one charming collection: metroidvanias, puzzle games, platformers, a roguelite, and even a deck builder. Built with love in PICO-8!
